means: 反社会的人，不爱社交的人

word_mean: 对抗社会病态人格者：以往用于指有反社会人格的人(一种精神病人)。参见personality

sentence.Network_en: You couldn't know you were dating a vicious , murdering sociopath.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不可能知道你在和一个恶毒的 、 反社会的凶手约会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 作为医学与社会科学之间的交叉学科,研究与健康相关的社会问题,为社会病做出努力,是社会医学义不容辞的 。概念尽管“ 社会病(sociopath)” 这个词使用得.
sociometry 社会测量法sociopath 反社会者sociopath 社会病
sociometry 社会人际学sociopath 反社会的人sociopolitical 社会政治的

list.abs: Characteristic of ……的特征Violent sociopath 暴力反社会者I
as a sociopath with paranoid delusions ., 幻想性精神分裂症.
社会病态人格又称社会病态人格(sociopathic personality),他的特徵事缺乏责任感和伦理道德.他明知这是不对的,但总缺乏内在的约束力.-
social age 社会年龄sociopathic personality 社会病态个性superego 超我
纽约太阳报作家Williams Myers给格瓦拉贴上了一个“反社会的暴徒（sociopathic thug）“的标签。其它一些美国报纸的批评家也有同样的评价。这些批评家声称切·格瓦拉本人应该对古巴监狱中数百人.

entry.def: A sociopath is the same as a psychopath .

means.word_mean: 1. someone with a sociopathic personality; a person with an antisocial personality disorder (`psychopath' was once widely used but has now been superseded by `sociopath')

auth_sentence.content: Is a psychopath laterally the same as a sociopath?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is a psychopath laterally the same as a sociopath?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is a psychopath laterally the same as a sociopath?

auth_sentence.content: Unlike a sociopath, I can imagine being old.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unlike a sociopath, I can imagine being old.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unlike a sociopath, I can imagine being old.

auth_sentence.content: What can I say, I must be a specio-sociopath.
auth_sentence.res_content: What can I say, I must be a specio-sociopath.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What can I say, I must be a specio-sociopath.
